title: It’s Her Senior Year And She’s Determined To Officially Start Dating
description:
Do you remember the very first boyfriend or girlfriend you’ve ever had? When was it? and how did it happen?
Our listener Maxi is in her senior year of high school, and she just got word from her parents that she is officially allowed to start dating,
All her friends have been dating already for some time now, but she never wanted them to know that she wasn’t allow to. She’s already one week into her last year of high school and is determined to make this year the best year yet.
There’s a new boy from Virginia that just started going to her school and he sits behind her in class. Maxi is extremely nervous. She’s never asked a guy out before and wants him to know that she’s interested.
Kristin suggested that Maxi arrange a group hang out with her friends and invite the new boy to join. That way, there’s not so much pressure, and he’ll be introduced to other people from school.
How would you approach the new boy?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
